page.title: 10Events in the Community
page.content: Once a year the local community meet to form a committee to organise a Village Fair. This Fair has many varied stalls. eg. cake and candy, local produce etc... Teas are served in the village hall. At night a dance is held in the Hall. The proceeds of this Fair are divided in two - half to Church funds and half to defray expenses of the Village Hall. At the end of August the Annual Flower Show is held, again in the Village Hall. This is a very comprehensive show of flowers, vegetables, handicrafts and baking. The first Flower Show was held over 100 years ago, but was cancelled during the second World War. It was revived again by Mrs Ad Grey from Ingleston, after the 2nd World War and has been held annually ever since.
